rewrite1:
Revised instructions:

"Navigate to the sixth paragraph and modify the Outline Level setting to 'Body Text'. Then, alter the line spacing to a Single line.

Move to the third paragraph, set the Outline to Level 1, reduce the font size to 48 points, ensure that any underline is removed, and adjust the right indentation to -1 cm."
rewrite2:
Please proceed with the following formatting changes for the specified paragraphs in the Word document:

For paragraph six, please set the Outline Level to 'Body Text' and alter the line spacing to a Single line format.

Moving on to paragraph three, assign a Level 1 Outline to it. Then, reduce the font size to 48 points. Make sure to eliminate any underlining present, and adjust the right indentation to a negative 1 centimeter.
rewrite3:
Please adjust the settings for the sixth paragraph by setting the Outline Level to 'Body Text' and altering the line spacing to a Single line format.

Regarding the third paragraph: set the Outline to Level 1, reduce the font size to 48 points, ensure that underlining is removed, and alter the right indentation so that it is decreased by 1cm.
